item.title: Israel Kamakawiwo'ole - Somewhere Over The Rainbow - Key of C - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Somewhere Over The Rainbow by Israel Kamakawiwo'ole from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: Am, C, Cmaj7, E7, Em, F, G.

item.title: Israel Kamakawiwo'ole - What A Wonderful World - Kevin Way
item.description: Play along video for the song What A Wonderful World by Israel Kamakawiwo'ole from the channel Kevin Way. Chords used in the song: Am, C, E7, Em, F, F9, G.

item.title: Israel Kamakawiwo'ole - White Sandy Beach of Hawaii - Key of F - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song White Sandy Beach of Hawaii by Israel Kamakawiwo'ole from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: B♭, B♭m7, C7, F.
